subject: Marathon Running
Running
Women
lead_paragraph: Two miles into the 1967 Boston Marathon, an official tried to eject me from the race because I was a woman. That event changed my life and the lives of millions of women around the world.
snippet: Two miles into the 1967 Boston Marathon, an official tried to eject me from the race because I was a woman. That event changed my life and the lives of millions of women around the world.
